      • connectToAddress

        public void connectToAddress(java.lang.String address,
                             boolean insecureConnection,
                             boolean withPortTrick)
        Connect to bluetooth device using its address.
        Parameters:
        address - Device address.
        insecureConnection - True if you don't need the data to be encrypted.
        withPortTrick - https://stackoverflow.com/a/25647197/5552022.
